metadata.name: new_object_swf_4
metadata.description: Tests NEW_OBJECT opcode (0x40) - creates objects and arrays via constructor calls. Supports Array constructor with length parameter, multiple elements, and Object constructor. Tests array length property and element access.
missing_features: Object property setting/getting has a bug (SET_MEMBER or GET_MEMBER issue, not NEW_OBJECT)
Constructor function invocation with 'this' binding not implemented
Built-in constructors beyond Array and Object not implemented (Date, String, Number, Boolean, etc.)
Constructor return value handling not implemented

edge_cases_tested: new Array(n) with single numeric argument
new Array(e1, e2, ...) with multiple elements
